Classes

ListNode

Base template class that allows its instances to be included in ELLISTs, because of its common first ELLNODE element.

ProcessDataObserver

ListNode abstract class with methods to process pdo messages from the scanner.

asynPortDriver classes

ecAsyn

This is an asyn port to service PDO requests. The class processes readback from the scanner in a separate thread that fills in the parameter system in asynPortDriver. Read requests are processed by the base class, as they get values directly from the parameter lists. Write requests generate messages to the scanner that are sent through the engine's queue system.

Sampler

Class that collects samples arriving from the scanner (process data observer) and fills in to its associated waveform port class.

WaveformPort

Asyn port driver class that implements parameters related to generic ADC data.

XFCPort

Asyn port driver class that serves the "MISSED" parameter to inform of missed samples in oversampling slaves.

ecMaster

Asyn port driver class that serves parameters related to the ethercat master.

Parameter name Description

Origin

Cycle

scanner

WorkingCounter

scanner

Missed

scanner

WcState

scanner

Missed Counter for missed cycles.This is obtained by monitoring every message from the scanner
